name: myFaveFood.com
tag_list: food, dining, foodie, restaurant, reviews, social-network, eating, chat, forums, pizza, hamburger, sandwich
overview:
myFaveFood is a social networking website for “foodies, gourmets, gastronomes, and anyone who enjoys a good meal”. Members talk about their favorite food and dining experiences and vote on others’ favorite foods, such as a succulent piece of salmon and fresh fruit enjoyed at a coastal waterfront setting, a wood-fired pizza with a tasty charred crust and just the right amount of cheese, or a delicious seafood enchilada found in the heart of Cajun Country.

Discussion forums offer posters the ability to chat, share recipes and photos, and express their views on food-related topics such as options for healthy eating, favorite and oddest pizza toppings, top Mediterranean dishes, and ideas for preparing non-traditional salads.

A website directory showcases a variety of food-related blogs and other destinations. The catalog is searchable or easily navigated by tags including “barbecue”, “cupcakes”, “food truck”, “salsa”, “seafood”, and “wine”, or locations such as California, Las Vegas, New York City, Sydney, and Texas. Submissions of food-related sites and blogs are strongly encouraged and currently free.

Other features include the ability to “Fellow Foodie” friends with similar tastes, as well as websites and blogs one enjoys visiting. Profile pages allow members to showcase their foodie knowledge and accounts on other social networks.
